name: Epoch
description: The future stands at its seams, awaiting those who can hold it and use it for themselves, giving rise to a competition that mercilessly removes those who fail to evolve. With Epoch, you will have gained access to a world that remains untampered and restricted, for the masses can not imagine reaching the versatility your advanced outfits possess, the ability to perform and adapt according to the circumstances to yield the best possible results. With Epoch, you can expect to dazzle like the stars wherever you go, remaining distinct and forever relevant in the eyes of those around you.
